alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Wallace and western Logan Counties through 300 AM MDT/400 AM CDT/... At 229 AM MDT/329 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Russell Springs, or 23 miles east of Sharon Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Russell Springs around 340 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM MDT/500 AM CDT/ for west central Kansas.
